name: Card Chaos (Spartan Game Labs)
description:
Description:The player is thrown into a world where they need to fight through rounds of enemies with the deck they build after every victory. The players deck will only start out with basic cards such as swords and shields, but upon winning are prompted with a choice to add a special card to their deck. The players health will not be reset after every battle for an increase in challenge.

Directions:Check tutorial for more detailed directions. Click on cards to deal damage. The player will gain 3 mana after every turn and any excess mana will be transferred over to the next turn. Click on end turn when you are either out of mana or you are satisfied with your turn. Once you lose, you restart with your original deck of starter cards.
